00036 #ifndef CELLID_HPP_
00037 #define CELLID_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00040 #include "AbstractCellProperty.hpp"
00041 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00042 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00043 #include "Exception.hpp"
00044 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00045 
00046 class CellId;
00047 
00057 class CellId : public AbstractCellProperty
00058 {
00059 private:
00060 
00064     unsigned mCellId;
00065 
00067     static unsigned mMaxCellId;
00068 
00070     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00077     template<class Archive>
00078     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00079     {
00080         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCellProperty>(*this);
00081         archive & mCellId;
00082         if (!PetscTools::IsParallel()) // This is to avoid changing the static i.d. in parallel simulations
00083         {
00084             archive & mMaxCellId;
00085         }
00086     }
00087 
00088 public:
00089 
00095     CellId();
00096 
00100     virtual ~CellId();
00101 
00106     void AssignCellId();
00107 
00111     unsigned GetMaxCellId() const;
00112 
00116     unsigned GetCellId() const;
00117 
00121     static void ResetMaxCellId();
00122 };
00123 
00124 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
00125 // Declare identifier for the serializer
00126 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(CellId)
00127 
00128 #endif /* CELLID_HPP_ */
